title.description: The title of the returned item.
title.title: Title

usage.description: This property shows where you can use the returned item for, for instance: Web3D.
usage.title: Usage

quality.description: This property shows what the quality of the returned item is.
quality.title: Quality

uri.description: This property shows what the URI of the returned item is.
uri.title: URI

file_type.description: This property shows what the file type of the returned item is.
file_type.title: File Type

draco_compressed.description: This property shows if the returned item is Draco compressed or not.
draco_compressed.title: Draco Compressed

rowCount.description: The row count of the items that get returned.
rowCount.title: Row Count

message.description: The message that describes the response, for instance: content found.
message.title: Message

status.description: This property shows the status code of the error, for instance: '400' or '404'.
status.title: Status

responseCode.description: This property shows the response code of the error, for instance: '0'.
responseCode.title: Response Code

error.description: This property shows the description of the error: for instance: 'not found: the resource you were acting on could not be found'.
error.title: Error

timestamp.description: This property shows the timestamp of the error, for instance: 'Fri Jun 07 09:23:09 EDT 2019'.
timestamp.title: Timestamp

get.description: This action searches the Smithsonian 3D API and fetches content based on a query/filter.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: The query term you would like to issue. Examples: Mandible, Space Shuttle, Crab.

parameters.name: file_type
parameters.description: The file type to filter results against.

parameters.name: quality
parameters.description: The quality type to filter results against.

parameters.name: model_type
parameters.description: The model type to filter results against.

parameters.name: gltf_orientation_compliant
parameters.description: Restrict results to glTF orientation compliant files.

parameters.name: draco_compressed
parameters.description: Restrict results to Draco compressed files.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The start of the result set.

parameters.name: rows
parameters.description: The number of rows in a result set (maximum is 100).
